channel.title: How do I transform this to be text compatible?

item.title: How do I transform this to be text compatible?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Well the line of code is setting the variable player to this. And this “player” variable is used to describe the person attempting to log in. Where do you suggest the BurfferedReader and BufferedWriter go in this line?

item.title: How do I transform this to be text compatible?

item.description:
@Docent wrote:

try {
		Player player = (Player) xstream.fromXML(new FileInputStream("data/characters/"+p.getUsername()+".txt"));

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

I want to change this so that instead of looking for and reading an XML file, it will look for and read a .txt file.
